Description: Book of the Dead of Padimut; sheet 1; offering vignette in red and black(partially obscured by lacunae); Hieratic text in red and black ink(two columns).
Curator's comments: Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 91, 98-99.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (177)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134523) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134523)
